extendedInfo.description: Love donuts? Crave these lovable sweet baked desserts all the time? If you have a sweet tooth when it comes to donuts â then Donut Maker is your app!Donât know how to make donuts? No problem! Donut Maker guides you through the process of making these sweet treats as you try to make the donut of your dreams. Mix ingredients, cut out donuts, fry and decorate. Itâs as simple as that. Itâs incredibly easy, and so much fun.Bring out the master chef inside you and fry countless, varied donuts in your very own bakery. Fill your donuts with custard, jam, caramel and more. Coat it in melted chocolate or drown it in flavored syrups of your choice!Coat it with different toppings* - sprinkle some sugar crumbs, put on some candy, add some fresh fruits, put on waffle rolls, cover it in chocolate and surround it with toffees and candy canes.Decorate* it with paper umbrellas and other little toys for your young ones to play with â like toy ducks, teddy bears, dolphins, beach balls, helicopters, speed boats, trucks, motorbikes, cars, windmills and toy horses!!! Your creativity is the limit! Because weâll be adding so much more stuff in coming updates youâll be hooked to it like a fish hooked to bait on a fishing rod.We know youâre crazy about Boston CrÃ¨mes and Jelly Donuts and Choco Munchkins, so letâs make them!  Whenever you want, wherever you want â without getting your hands dirty! Learn how to make all types of donuts. Here is your chance to make those Doughnuts that are not available in your area â ever heard of the delicious, crispy French Cruller â or juicy, sweet Jelly Doughnuts?With coffee during the afternoon break, or with pancakes in the morning, you can have donuts with just about everything. Donut Maker lets you cook these tasty, creamy treats on the go. Share cooked donuts over Facebook, save a picture to your phone, or eat them if youâre hungry!===== FEATURES =====- Attractive, colorful visuals- Hundreds of combinations â With several syrups, icings, toppings and decorations to choose from, you can make hundreds of different donuts.- Edible Decorations â Decorate it with some sugary eyes, jelly mustaches, biscuit hat, sugar coated sprinkles, candy fruit!- Kids friendly content â A real eye candy for kids - Bring out the creativity in your children! No violence or monsters or zombies or scares.- Unlock Store items to make even more crazy varieties of donuts!!!!- Share with friends â Share your created donuts with your friends on Facebook.============================================================PRIVACY POLICY:As a designer of kidsâ games, we understand how important privacy is in this modern, digital world. You can read our privacy policy here: www.nuttyapps.com/privacypolicy.IN-APP PURCHASES: This app lets you purchase digital content using actual money. On Google Wallet, you can configure parental controls to avoid unintentional purchases.NEED HELP?Contact us with any questions or comments: nuttyfeedback@gmail.com============================================================NOTE: Not all items will be available for donut making at launch. Will be pushed in later versionsApp supports Android 2.2 (Froyo) to Android 4.x Ice Cream Sandwich and Jellybeans. DISCLAIMER:All BGMs are the property of Kevin MacLeod. reviews.comment: My kids love the game, but the creator uses AirPush, which sends ads to your notification window. I can certainly deal with ads in a free app, but on my phone when I\'m not even using the app?! Come on, that\'s not cool. I\'m uninstalling, which is a shame.
